text: Andrei Aleksandrovich Kruchin (; born 6 October 1970 in Yaroslavl) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Sportspeople from Yaroslavl Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Akzhayik players Category:FC SKA Rostov-on-Don players Category:FC Rostov players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Shinnik Yaroslavl players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Spartak- UGP Anapa players Category:FC Metallurg Lipetsk players Category:FC Vityaz Podolsk players Category:FC Yugra Nizhnevartovsk players Category:Association football defenders
title: Andrei Kruchin
